name: Kodiak Magog Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
description: Like workboots for everyday wear, the Magog are prepared to take on winter. Serious steps have been taken to keep your feet dry and warm, starting with a waterproof leather shell that has had all of it seams sealed, a waterproof-breathable membrane and a sweat-wicking liner.Waterproof leather, sealed seams and a waterproof-breathable lining let your feet breathe while staying dry.200 grams of Thinsulate™ insulation synthetic insulation light and efficient.Soft microfibre lining is warm and wicks away moisture.Leather and memory foam insole contours comfortably to your foot and is removable should you want to add your own insole.Chunky rubber tread provides great traction.
